a.title: SPECIAL EDUCATION SERVICES DURING DISTANCE LEARNING
a.span: SPECIAL EDUCATION SERVICES DURING DISTANCE LEARNING

br.style: font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center;

span.style: font-size: 20px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: "MS Sans Serif";

a.title: SERVICIOS de EDUCACIÓN ESPECIALDURANTE EL PERIODO DEAPRENDIZAJE A DISTANCIA
a.span: SERVICIOS de EDUCACIÓN ESPECIALDURANTE EL PERIODO DEAPRENDIZAJE A DISTANCIA

strong.span: This information is intended to provide updates on Le Sueur-Henderson Public Schools' response plan to the outbreak of COVID-19, the illness caused by the coronavirus. The situation is evolving and information and recommendations are changing daily as new information becomes available.

strong.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: large; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center;
strong.span: Please refer to the Minnesota Department of Health (MDH) and Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) for the latest updates regarding COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 20px; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

span.br: While a new type of illness can be scary, we can protect our students, staff and the broader community by using simple everyday actions that protect people from other types of respiratory or flu-like illnesses.

li.span: Stay home when sick with cold/flu-like symptoms (such as fever, cough, shortness of breath).
Cover a cough. Cough or sneeze into an elbow or use a tissue and place immediately in the trash.
Wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth with unwashed hands.

div.p: Le Sueur-Henderson Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. Le Sueur-Henderson Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
